title:
Wassup My Fellow Nightshifters?!

How's it going out there for yas? Hopefully smoOooth as all get out...

attachments.displayName:
Wassup My Fellow Nightshifters?!

How's it going out there for yas? Hopefully smoOooth as all get out.

Commodores - Nightshift <--- Yes. Smooth ;-)

Try as I may, try as I might.. it's the night time! The 'witching hours' all my creative inspiration hits? BOOM! Pow. Ideas galore. Yet oh-so-nice. Like heaven to me. Maybe because it’s devoid of distraction, so serenely quiet, nothing else left to do in the day, there’s no one else to hurry to. Just me being me and pouring out a plethora o' emotions gathered from the day. Maybe a form of processing it all? And lettin' it flow 'un-contrivedly' — using those magical nighttime creativity surges to create whatever my heart's dreaming of in those moments...

Not sure. Thinkin' about not battling it anymore. It's mah magic time*** And hopefully, if you're reading this late? It's yours too. Let it flow~~~

~spins the clock to her own liking~ ;)

Image Source: goo.gl/91UJbQ
